author: Staff Reporter
text:
Samskrita Bharati will hold a debate in Sanskrit on January 26 at 3.30 p.m. at Ramar Temple in Ramnagar. A release from the organisers says that the debate (pattimandram) will be ‘Society gets inspired in nation-building – from the life of great personalities or from scriptures and texts of lore’. Samskrita Bharati vice-president R. Ramachandran will preside over the debate. The programme will go on till 6.30 p.m.

Workshop

The Bombay Chartered Accountants Society is organising a workshop on Internal Financial Controls, IND AS and Refresher on Companies Act, 2013 on 5 and 6 February. The venue for the workshop is The Residency Towers, Avinashi Road. Visitwww.bcasonline.org/ pdf/efvents/FCA.pdfor contact Priya- 0422-2541398 for more information.
